trans-unit.source: Represents the typed value of a validated XML element or attribute.
trans-unit.target: 代表已驗證的 XML 元素或屬性的具類型的值。

trans-unit.source: The XmlAtomicValue class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: XmlAtomicValue 類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: Returns a copy of this <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlAtomicValue"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回一份這<xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlAtomicValue"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlAtomicValue"></xref> object copy of this <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlAtomicValue"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlAtomicValue"> </xref>物件這份<xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlAtomicValue"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the validated XML element or attribute is an XPath node or an atomic value.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否已驗證的 XML 元素或屬性的 XPath 節點或不可部分完成的值。

trans-unit.source: The IsNode property always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: IsNode 屬性一律會傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the validated XML element or attribute is an XPath node; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the validated XML element or attribute is an atomic value.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已驗證的 XML 元素或屬性是 XPath 節點。<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>是否已驗證的 XML 元素或屬性不可部分完成的值。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlAtomicValue.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlAtomicValue.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlAtomicValue> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ICloneable> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它可用時，才<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlAtomicValue>執行個體轉換成<xref:System.ICloneable>介面。</xref:System.ICloneable> </xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlAtomicValue>

trans-unit.source: Returns a copy of this <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlAtomicValue"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回一份這<xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlAtomicValue"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value of the validated XML element or attribute.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref>已驗證的 XML 項目或屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value of the validated XML element or attribute.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref>已驗證的 XML 項目或屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current validated XML element or attribute as a boxed object of the most appropriate Microsoft .NET Framework type according to its schema type.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前已驗證的 XML 元素或屬性做為最適當的 Microsoft.NET Framework 型別，根據其資料類型的 boxed 物件。

trans-unit.source: If the value of the item is not valid according to its specified schema type, the value of the TypedValue property is equivalent to the value of the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlAtomicValue.Value%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 根據指定的結構描述型別無效的項目值，TypedValue 屬性的值是否相等的值<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlAtomicValue.Value%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlAtomicValue.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about type support in the <xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName> namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關型別支援<xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName>命名空間，請參閱[System.Xml 類別中的型別支援](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The current validated XML element or attribute as a boxed object of the most appropriate .NET Framework type.
trans-unit.target: 目前的驗證 XML 元素或屬性的最適當的.NET Framework 類型的 boxed 物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value of the validated XML element or attribute.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref>已驗證的 XML 項目或屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value of the validated XML element or attribute.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref>已驗證的 XML 項目或屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the validated XML element or attribute's value as the type specified using the <xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver> object specified to resolve namespace prefixes.
trans-unit.target: 傳回已驗證的 XML 元素或屬性的值為使用指定的型別<xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver>指定用來解析命名空間前置詞的物件。</xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver>

trans-unit.source: The ValueAs method attempts to convert the value of the validated XML element or attribute to the Microsoft .NET Framework type specified.
trans-unit.target: ValueAs 方法會嘗試將已驗證的 XML 項目或屬性的值轉換成指定的 Microsoft.NET Framework 型別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver> object is used to resolve namespace prefixes related to type conversions.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver>物件用來解析與型別轉換相關的命名空間前置詞。</xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver>

trans-unit.source: For example, when converting an `xs:QName` to an `xs:string`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，當轉換`xs:QName`至`xs:string`。

trans-unit.source: For more information about type support in the <xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName> namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關型別支援<xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName>命名空間，請參閱[System.Xml 類別中的型別支援](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The type to return the validated XML element or attribute's value as.
trans-unit.target: 傳回已驗證的 XML 元素或屬性的值做為型別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver> object used to resolve namespace prefixes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver>物件，用來解析命名空間前置詞。</xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver>

trans-unit.source: The value of the validated XML element or attribute as the type requested.
trans-unit.target: 已驗證的 XML 項目或屬性做為要求的型別值。

trans-unit.source: The validated XML element or attribute's value is not in the correct format for the target type.
trans-unit.target: 已驗證的 XML 元素或屬性的值不是格式正確的目標類型。

trans-unit.source: The attempted cast is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試的轉換無效。

trans-unit.source: The attempted cast resulted in an overflow.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試的轉換導致溢位。

trans-unit.source: Gets the validated XML element or attribute's value as a <xref:System.Boolean>.
trans-unit.target: 取得已驗證的 XML 元素或屬性的值為<xref:System.Boolean>.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: The ValueAsBoolean property attempts to convert the value of the validated XML element or attribute to the Microsoft .NET Framework <xref:System.Boolean> type according to the XPath 2.0 rules for casting the item's type.
trans-unit.target: 已驗證的 XML 項目或屬性的值轉換成 Microsoft.NET Framework 嘗試 ValueAsBoolean 屬性<xref:System.Boolean>類型的項目類型轉換的 XPath 2.0 規則。</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: For more information about type support in the <xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName> namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關型別支援<xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName>命名空間，請參閱[System.Xml 類別中的型別支援](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The validated XML element or attribute's value as a <xref:System.Boolean>.
trans-unit.target: 已驗證的 XML 元素或屬性的值為<xref:System.Boolean>.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: The validated XML element or attribute's value is not in the correct format for the <xref:System.Boolean> type.
trans-unit.target: 已驗證的 XML 元素或屬性的值不是正確格式的<xref:System.Boolean>型別。</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: The attempted cast to <xref:System.Boolean> is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 若要嘗試的轉換<xref:System.Boolean>不正確。</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: Gets the validated XML element or attribute's value as a <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: 取得已驗證的 XML 元素或屬性的值為<xref:System.DateTime>.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: The ValueAsDateTime property attempts to convert the value of the validated XML element or attribute to the Microsoft .NET Framework <xref:System.DateTime> type according to the XPath 2.0 rules for casting the item's type.
trans-unit.target: 已驗證的 XML 項目或屬性的值轉換成 Microsoft.NET Framework 嘗試 ValueAsDateTime 屬性<xref:System.DateTime>類型的項目類型轉換的 XPath 2.0 規則。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: For more information about type support in the <xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName> namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關型別支援<xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName>命名空間，請參閱[System.Xml 類別中的型別支援](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The validated XML element or attribute's value as a <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: 已驗證的 XML 元素或屬性的值為<xref:System.DateTime>.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: The validated XML element or attribute's value is not in the correct format for the <xref:System.DateTime> type.
trans-unit.target: 已驗證的 XML 元素或屬性的值不是正確格式的<xref:System.DateTime>型別。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: The attempted cast to <xref:System.DateTime> is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 若要嘗試的轉換<xref:System.DateTime>不正確。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: Gets the validated XML element or attribute's value as a <xref:System.Double>.
trans-unit.target: 取得已驗證的 XML 元素或屬性的值為<xref:System.Double>.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: The ValueAsDouble property attempts to convert the value of the validated XML element or attribute to the Microsoft .NET Framework <xref:System.Double> type according to the XPath 2.0 rules for casting the item's type.
trans-unit.target: 已驗證的 XML 項目或屬性的值轉換成 Microsoft.NET Framework 嘗試 ValueAsDouble 屬性<xref:System.Double>類型的項目類型轉換的 XPath 2.0 規則。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: For more information about type support in the <xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName> namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關型別支援<xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName>命名空間，請參閱[System.Xml 類別中的型別支援](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The validated XML element or attribute's value as a <xref:System.Double>.
trans-unit.target: 已驗證的 XML 元素或屬性的值為<xref:System.Double>.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: The validated XML element or attribute's value is not in the correct format for the <xref:System.Double> type.
trans-unit.target: 已驗證的 XML 元素或屬性的值不是正確格式的<xref:System.Double>型別。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: The attempted cast to <xref:System.Double> is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 若要嘗試的轉換<xref:System.Double>不正確。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: The attempted cast resulted in an overflow.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試的轉換導致溢位。

trans-unit.source: Gets the validated XML element or attribute's value as an <xref:System.Int32>.
trans-unit.target: 取得已驗證的 XML 元素或屬性的值為<xref:System.Int32>.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: The ValueAsInt property attempts to convert the value of the validated XML element or attribute to the Microsoft .NET Framework <xref:System.Int32> type according to the XPath 2.0 rules for casting the item's type.
trans-unit.target: 已驗證的 XML 項目或屬性的值轉換成 Microsoft.NET Framework 嘗試 ValueAsInt 屬性<xref:System.Int32>類型的項目類型轉換的 XPath 2.0 規則。</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: For more information about type support in the <xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName> namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關型別支援<xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName>命名空間，請參閱[System.Xml 類別中的型別支援](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The validated XML element or attribute's value as an <xref:System.Int32>.
trans-unit.target: 已驗證的 XML 元素或屬性的值為<xref:System.Int32>.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: The validated XML element or attribute's value is not in the correct format for the <xref:System.Int32> type.
trans-unit.target: 已驗證的 XML 元素或屬性的值不是正確格式的<xref:System.Int32>型別。</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: The attempted cast to <xref:System.Int32> is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 若要嘗試的轉換<xref:System.Int32>不正確。</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: The attempted cast resulted in an overflow.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試的轉換導致溢位。

trans-unit.source: Gets the validated XML element or attribute's value as an <xref:System.Int64>.
trans-unit.target: 取得已驗證的 XML 元素或屬性的值為<xref:System.Int64>.</xref:System.Int64>

trans-unit.source: The ValueAsLong property attempts to convert the value of the validated XML element or attribute to the Microsoft .NET Framework <xref:System.Int64> type according to the XPath 2.0 rules for casting the item's type.
trans-unit.target: 已驗證的 XML 項目或屬性的值轉換成 Microsoft.NET Framework 嘗試 ValueAsLong 屬性<xref:System.Int64>類型的項目類型轉換的 XPath 2.0 規則。</xref:System.Int64>

trans-unit.source: For more information about type support in the <xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName> namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關型別支援<xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName>命名空間，請參閱[System.Xml 類別中的型別支援](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The validated XML element or attribute's value as an <xref:System.Int64>.
trans-unit.target: 已驗證的 XML 元素或屬性的值為<xref:System.Int64>.</xref:System.Int64>

trans-unit.source: The validated XML element or attribute's value is not in the correct format for the <xref:System.Int64> type.
trans-unit.target: 已驗證的 XML 元素或屬性的值不是正確格式的<xref:System.Int64>型別。</xref:System.Int64>

trans-unit.source: The attempted cast to <xref:System.Int64> is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 若要嘗試的轉換<xref:System.Int64>不正確。</xref:System.Int64>

trans-unit.source: The attempted cast resulted in an overflow.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試的轉換導致溢位。

trans-unit.source: Gets the Microsoft .NET Framework type of the validated XML element or attribute.
trans-unit.target: 取得 Microsoft.NET Framework 類型的已驗證的 XML 元素或屬性。

trans-unit.source: The ValueType property gets the .NET Framework type of the typed value of the validated XML element or attribute.
trans-unit.target: ValueType 屬性取得的.NET Framework 類型的已驗證的 XML 元素或屬性的具類型值。

trans-unit.source: For example, an element of type `xs:int` would have a ValueType of <xref:System.Int32> by default.
trans-unit.target: 例如，類型的元素`xs:int`會有的 ValueType<xref:System.Int32>預設。</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: However, the ValueType could be any one of the valid types that can be mapped to `xs:int`, such as <xref:System.Int16> or <xref:System.Double>.
trans-unit.target: 不過，ValueType 可能是任何一個可以對應到有效型別`xs:int`，例如<xref:System.Int16>或<xref:System.Double>.</xref:System.Double> </xref:System.Int16>

trans-unit.source: For more information about type support in the <xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName> namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關型別支援<xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName>命名空間，請參閱[System.Xml 類別中的型別支援](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework type of the validated XML element or attribute.
trans-unit.target: 已驗證的 XML 項目或屬性的.NET Framework 型別。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaType"></xref> for the validated XML element or attribute.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaType"></xref>已驗證的 XML 項目或屬性。

trans-unit.source: The XmlType property gets the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaType> for the validated XML element or attribute.
trans-unit.target: XmlType 屬性會取得<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaType>已驗證的 XML 項目或屬性。</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaType>

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSimpleType> or <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaComplexType>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSimpleType>或<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaComplexType>.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaComplexType> </xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSimpleType>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaType"></xref> for the validated XML element or attribute.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaType"> </xref>已驗證的 XML 項目或屬性。
